def-group.definition: {{{ oval_metadata("Check if tmux is configured to exec at the end of bashrc.") }}}

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: check tmux is configured to exec on the last line of /etc/bashrc

ind:textfilecontent54_object.ind:pattern:
if \[ "\$PS1" \]; then
\s+parent=\$\(ps -o ppid= -p \$\$\)
\s+name=\$\(ps -o comm= -p \$parent\)
\s+case "\$name" in sshd\|login\) exec tmux ;; esac
fi
